WNDP - WebNegócio Lda. (VAT PT513782540) focus is to provide a decent, reliable hosting service. Not many words needed here. Our clients do know what we’re talking about.
So, turns out we’re expecting a baby in the 24th of November. I’m fucking happy. But also need to pay bills pretty often, so let’s help each other and the father…
Planned for next month: DE server will be migrated to Ryzen 3700X, 64GB RAM ECC, 4x1TB NVMe, take this chance, won’t be back any time soon! And help the father… And the child… And… Well, spend money with us, you’ll enjoy it.
